name: A black spiked whip of torment (1h)
data: It has almost non-existent weapon class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It decreases the users physical resistance adequately.
It gives small penalty to the skill 'dodge'.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'attack'.
It gives small penalty to the skill 'parry'.
It seems to have a pitch-black aura surrounding it.
